explains: adj. 羊毛的；模糊的；似羊毛的
wordGroup: woolly mammoth 猛犸象；长毛象

sentences.en: She wore this woolly hat with pompoms.
sentences.cn: 她戴着这顶带绒球的羊毛帽。

sentences.en: Winona was now comfortably enfolded in a woolly dressing-gown.
sentences.cn: 维诺娜身上正舒服地裹着件羊毛晨衣。

sentences.en: Its concepts are woolly and untestable, yet are regarded as unassailable axioms.
sentences.cn: 它的概念模糊而不可测试，但却被认为是公理而无懈可击。
